definition: Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]

sentences.english: Spectrum rebuilding scheme, a wavelength detection scheme with high accuracy, is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 利用光谱重建法，得到了一种高精度的波长检测方案。

sentences.english: A kind of making real-color rainbow hologram with single-wavelength and single-beam are presented. First make three films of rainbow encoded.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种单波长单光束真彩色彩虹全息图制作技术。

sentences.english: A method is reported for the detection and analysis of saccharin concentration indrinkables by dual-wavelength UV scan.
sentences.chinese: 本文采用双波长紫外扫描法测定饮料中糖精钠的含量。

sentences.english: In this paper, we brief the basic principle of multiple wavelengths ADI that is also called fractional fringe measurement.
sentences.chinese: 超外差测量还能够实现合成波长相位的实时检测。

sentences.english: The tropospheric atmosphere refractivity of different laser wave length is expatiated.
sentences.chinese: 阐述了对流层不同波长激光的大气折射率。

sentences.english: Study on optical sub-wavelength structure has been a subject of great interest in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 光学亚波长结构研究是受国际重视的研究前沿。

sentences.english: There's no better way to be on the same wave-length than to use Esperanto.
sentences.chinese: 使用世界语是保持同一波长的最好办法。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the treatment effect on the nevus of Ota with special bandwidths laser.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察特殊波长激光对太田痣的治疗效果。

sentences.english: The contents of the lomefloxacin and tinidazole in the tablets were determined by dual wavelength spectrophotometry.
sentences.chinese: 采用双波长法测定泡腾片中洛美沙星和替硝唑的含量。

sentences.english: Besides, the minimum limits of different detecting waves were measured to give the method to detect trace amount of aristolochic acid.
sentences.chinese: 测定不同波长下的最低检出限度，痕量分析条件。

sentences.english: However, optical internetworking directly based optical wavelength has its intrinsic defects.
sentences.chinese: 然而，基于光波长通道的直接联网有它特有的局限性。

sentences.english: About the wavelength selectivity, the changing trends for different polarizations are in an opposite way.
sentences.chinese: 而对于波长响应，两种偏振态表现出不同的变化趋势。

sentences.english: You must first specify the diameter of the radiotelescope and the observing wavelength.
sentences.chinese: 您必须先指定无线电望远镜的直径，及观察波长。

sentences.english: The technology of All Optical Wavelength Converter (AOWC) is one of the key technologies in DWDM system.
sentences.chinese: 全光波长变换技术是DWDM系统中的一项关键技术。

sentences.english: I find several cutoff wavelength wavelength under different voltage.
sentences.chinese: 在电压一定时，找到了基膜的截止波长。

sentences.english: The property of peak wavelength of slanted reflection hologram grating was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 讨论了倾斜条纹反射全息光栅的波长特性。
